name: Applied Identities
tagline: The architecture of what comes next.
description: Applied Identities helps growth-market companies build the strategic identity layer that makes AI systems reason and act as authentic extensions of the organization.

frameworks.name: The Compiled Corporation
frameworks.description: Your competitors are restructuring into organizations where business logic executes directly through agent workflows. The companies that compile first don't capture efficiency — they set the competitive terms everyone else inherits. We build the identity architecture that makes compilation possible.

frameworks.name: Janus Brands
frameworks.description: Every brand now faces two audiences simultaneously — human customers who experience emotion and narrative, and AI agents that parse structured data and evaluate attributes. The companies that optimize for both capture the market. The ones that optimize for neither get filtered out of agent-mediated commerce.

frameworks.name: Decision Surfaces
frameworks.description: The new competitive battleground is where human judgment hands off to algorithmic execution. The company that controls its decision surfaces — designing the thresholds, the escalation logic, the delegation patterns — captures the margin. The one that leaves them to default configuration surrenders it.
